body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Deals. My name is Wayne Wright. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Kathleen Roberts.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six six six, seven seven seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And may I also have the first three digits of your address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. I appreciate your assistance. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm feeling relieved now. You've been very helpful.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kathleen. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact me. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. Goodbye.
